titles.title: Fire Station Improvement Act of 2022
Fire Station Improvement Act of 2022
A bill to expand the eligible uses of firefighter assistance grant funds, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Fire Station Improvement Act of 2022
This bill expands the eligible uses of firefighter assistance grant funds to cover the repair, modification, or improvement of fire stations, fire training facilities, and other similar facilities to improve the functionality of those facilities.
